research_metadata.research_notes: Program is clearly an energy efficiency incentive program, NOT a demand response program. FPL does offer actual DR programs (Business On Call and Commercial Demand Reduction) but this Custom Incentives program is for innovative energy-saving projects that reduce peak demand through efficiency measures, not load curtailment.

program_classification.explanation: This is an energy efficiency program that provides custom incentives for innovative projects that reduce electricity consumption and peak demand. It is NOT a demand response program because it does not involve load curtailment, interruptible service, or dispatch signals. The demand reduction is achieved through permanent efficiency improvements, not temporary load reductions.

program_details.program_description: Receive incentives for innovative ideas that significantly reduce your business's electricity use. Program provides tailored incentives for energy-saving initiatives that reduce summer peak demand by at least 25 kW.
program_details.program_objectives: Encourage innovative energy efficiency projects that reduce electricity consumption and peak demand in ways not covered by existing conservation programs.
program_details.eligible_technologies: Not specified - open to innovative proposals
ineligible_technologies: Technologies currently under evaluation by FPL
program_details.minimum_capacity_requirement: 25 kW reduction in summer peak demand (June-September)

participation_requirements.performance_verification: Project must pass Florida Public Service Commission cost-effectiveness tests

financial_information.incentive_structure: Custom incentives tailored to specific project

battery_storage_specific.battery_suitability_explanation: This is an energy efficiency program, not a demand response program. Batteries would not typically qualify for energy efficiency incentives as they do not reduce total energy consumption. FPL offers separate actual DR programs (Business On Call and Commercial Demand Reduction) where batteries could potentially participate.

operational_details.measurement_and_verification: Project must meet program standards and pass PSC cost-effectiveness tests

enrollment_process.how_to_enroll: Contact FPL customer representative or Business Care Center at 1-800-FPL-2434 (1-800-375-2434) to submit project proposal
enrollment_process.required_documentation: Project proposal detailing innovative energy-saving initiative
enrollment_process.technical_requirements: Project must differ from existing conservation programs and meet FPL standards

additional_notes.stacking_with_other_programs: Proposal must differ from existing conservation programs
additional_notes.related_programs: FPL also offers actual demand response programs: Business On Call and Commercial Demand Reduction
additional_notes.research_challenges: Limited public information on incentive amounts and specific project examples. Program is designed for custom evaluation, so specific parameters are determined case-by-case.
